thread.title: Leesburg man convicted of killing his father, burying him in backyard

author: Jason Ruiter
title: Leesburg man convicted of killing his father, burying him in backyard
text:
Leesburg man convicted of killing his father, burying him in backyard Jesse Rodney Jordan Jason Ruiter/Orlando Sentinel Jesse Rodney Jordan, 31, is uncuffed by an officer during the murder trial. Jesse Rodney Jordan, 31, is uncuffed by an officer during the murder trial. (Jason Ruiter/Orlando Sentinel) 
Remarried woman got $320K in widow benefits from dead husbands, reports say » Caption Woman stabs man who tried to rape her in Lake County 
A violent attack near the Four Corners area in Lake County early Thursday ended with a woman stabbing a man who allegedly tried to rape her. 
A violent attack near the Four Corners area in Lake County early Thursday ended with a woman stabbing a man who allegedly tried to rape her. Caption Woman stabs man who tried to rape her in Lake County 
A violent attack near the Four Corners area in Lake County early Thursday ended with a woman stabbing a man who allegedly tried to rape her. 
A violent attack near the Four Corners area in Lake County early Thursday ended with a woman stabbing a man who allegedly tried to rape her. Caption Lake County police chases plummet after policy change 
The agency has had over 300 chases since 2013 and after a shift in policy, police chases in Lake County dropped drastically. 
The agency has had over 300 chases since 2013 and after a shift in policy, police chases in Lake County dropped drastically. Caption Funerals set for grandmother, 3-year-old granddaughter killed in crash 
A celebration of life funeral service will be held Thursday for Debbie Irwin and her 3-year-old granddaughter Fallon Painter, who were killed over the weekend in a crash. 
A celebration of life funeral service will be held Thursday for Debbie Irwin and her 3-year-old granddaughter Fallon Painter, who were killed over the weekend in a crash. Caption Eustis man arrested for allegedly inappropriately touching child 
A Eustis man was arrested Sunday night for inappropriately touching a 9-year-old in the women’s restroom at the Via Port Mall in Leesburg, according to an arrest report. 
A Eustis man was arrested Sunday night for inappropriately touching a 9-year-old in the women’s restroom at the Via Port Mall in Leesburg, according to an arrest report. Caption Group proposing kayaks and canoes licensing 
To fans of kayaking, canoeing and paddle boarding, gliding along Florida waters is an expression of freedom; to advocates of boating-regulation reform, it's time to mandate licensing for small craft without motors. 
To fans of kayaking, canoeing and paddle boarding, gliding along Florida waters is an expression of freedom; to advocates of boating-regulation reform, it's time to mandate licensing for small craft without motors.
